steps.step: Rub and season the ahi tuna steak with the Shichimi Togarashi, for 15 minutes.

Heat up a pan on medium heat and add some olive oil to coat the pan. Pan-sear each side of the ahi tuna steak for about 30 seconds or as soon as the surface turns opaque. Dish out and let cool in the fridge.Prepare the Dressing by mixing all the ingredients together.To serve, toss the salad with the dressing and divide the salad into individual serving bowls. Slice the ahi tuna into pieces and lay them on the salad.
Add some Tobikko, shredded roasted seaweed, and sesame as toppings and serve immediately.
